talents.description: Once per round on your character’s turn, they may use this talent to draw or holster an easily accessible weapon or item as an incidental. Quick Draw also reduces a weapon’s Prepare rating by one, to a minimum of one.
Add BOOS per rank of Stalker to all Stealth and Coordination checks.

Your character creates a bond with a single animal approved by your GM.

Your character adds b for each rank of Quick Strike to any combat checks they make against any targets that have not yet taken their turn in the current encounter.
Suffer a number of strain up to ranks in Rapid Reaction to add an equal number of s to a Vigilance or Cool check they make to determine Initiative order.

After your character inflicts a Critical Injury with a ranged weapon and rolls the result, your character may suffer 2 strain to use this talent. Then, you may select any Critical Injury of the same severity to apply to the target instead.
